vertices.title: vertices
vertices.description: The list of stucco defined vertices

edges.title: edges
edges.description: The list of edges between stucco defined vertices

sourceDocument.description: xml string of STIX formatted source document

score.description: the calculated confidence score of this node
the calculated confidence score of this edge

Account.title: Account
Account.description: account on some specific system(s), either belonging to some specific user or a system account. All software runs as some account. All accounts are associated with a user or users (such as system accounts.)

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Account observables

Description.description: account Logs_In_To host; account Logs_In_From host

Login_Time.description: login time of this account into related host

Address.title: Address
Address.description: any address, either inside or outside of the network

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Address observables

Property.description: banner of this address represented as a custom field

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted AddressRange observables
set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted AS observables

DNSName.title: DNSName
DNSName.description: a DNS name (and possibly associated info - registration info, etc.)

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted  DNSName observables

DNSRecord.title: DNSRecord
DNSRecord.description: dns records of various domain name systems

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted DNSRecord observables

Description.description: ip address was requested by requester (Requested_By) and served by server (Served_By)

description.description: descriptive summary of this Exploit family

shortDescription.description: additional text description of this Exploit

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Exploits

Short_Description.description: short descriptive summary of this Exploit

Flow.title: Flow
Flow.description: a flow of traffic between two addresses

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Flow observables

Property.description: characteristics of this flow are represented with custom fields

Host.title: Host
Host.description: Any entity on the network, including PCs, routers, switches, virtual machines, etc.

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Host observables

Description.description: Host Runs Software; Host Resolved_To IP; Host Uses_Address Address

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted HTTP request observables

User_Agent.description: user agent of the http request

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted IP observables

Malware.title: Malware
Malware.description: any malicious software.  This can refer to either a stored binary or a running instance. Malware can contain code to launch an exploit. Malware can itself be an asset that an attacker uses in future attacks (eg. a backdoor left on a compromised system.) or can automatically launch additional attacks on behalf of the original attacker. Malware can be hosted by or communicate with servers controlled by the attacker. Malware can contain code to load other malware. Malware can reuse components from other malware samples.

description.description: descriptive summary of this malware family

details.description: additional text description of this malware

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Malware instances

Type.description: type of action taken in compliance with used process, registry key, or file

Description.description: descriptions of actions used by this Malware

Key.description: files, regestry keys, or processes used by this Malware during an attack

Name.description: name of file used by this Malware

Description.description: Course_Of_Action description of solution for Malware

Name.description: data source for this Malware solution

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Organization observables
set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Port observables

Service.title: Service
Service.description: expected or actual service using some port

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Service info observables

Property.description: Notes and References for this Service are represented as a custom fields

Software.title: Software
Software.description: Any software components on a system, including OSes, applications, services, and libraries.

name.xpath: .[local-name() = 'Observable']/*[local-name() = 'Object']/*[local-name() = 'Properties']/*[local-name() = 'Product' or local-name() = 'Vendor' or local-name() = 'Update' or local-name() = 'Edition' or local-name() = 'Language' or local-name() = 'Version'] | .[local-name() = 'Observable']/*[local-name() = 'Object']/*[local-name() = 'Properties']/*[local-name() = 'Custom_Properties']/*[local-name() = 'Property' and @name = "Part"]

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Software observables

Description.description: software Runs_As account; software Resolved_To process; software Moved_By flow

Relationship.description: Software Runs_As Account, Initialized_To Process, and Moved_By Flow

Vulnerability.title: Vulnerability
Vulnerability.description: a flaw in some software, that can cause improper, unintended operation, and can potentially be exploited as part of an attack

comparisonRules.description: set of rules to compare and link two STIX formatted Vulnerabilities (Exploit_Target) and their solutions (COA)

Served_By.title: Served_By
Served_By.description: DNSRecord Served_By IP; HTTPRequest Served_By DNSName
